item.title: 40 mph roadsign flattened following crash, 17th December
item.description:
The flattened sign is approximately 100yds before the Shell Petrol Station at the Cross Hands junction of the A46 on the lhs approaching the junction.. Sign needs removing and replacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Painswick Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
